# alignmentMode

**Instance Property**

Determines how individual lines of text are horizontally aligned within the receiver’s bounds.

## Declaration

```swift
var alignmentMode: CATextLayerAlignmentMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

The possible values are described in [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/horizontal-alignment-modes]. Defaults to [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CATextLayerAlignmentMode/natural].

## Text Alignment and Truncation

- **isWrapped**: Determines whether the text is wrapped to fit within the receiver’s bounds.
- **truncationMode**: Determines how the text is truncated to fit within the receiver’s bounds.
